name: ORNITHOGONIA
description:
In Ornithogonia, you will play as a young investigator searching the underground laboratory.

In  Ornithogonia, there are only three-level right now, and you will fight with monsters that are not friendly.

This is my project for the final, is not super good, but give it a try!

"ESC" For exit the game, "R" for reload the level.

"A" and "D" for "left" and "right", "shift" for dash.

Credit:

Simon, Zifeng, Cameron, Tim, Ethan, Henry, Miree

Thank you for your help :)

Design: FoxMiao   Art: FoxMiao   Code: FoxMiao
